1.title: Multi-Panel Infrastructure Setup
1.description: Create the technical foundation for multi-panel interfaces with Arabic and RTL support

1.1.title: Setup Four Panel Providers
1.1.description: Create AdminPanelProvider, AcademyPanelProvider, TeacherPanelProvider, and SupervisorPanelProvider
1.1.details: Create separate Panel Provider files for each role with appropriate routing settings and permissions

1.2.title: Configure Domain Routing
1.2.description: Configure routing for main domain and academy subdomains
1.2.details: Setup routes for main domain (/admin) and subdomains (/{academy}/panel, /teacher-panel, /supervisor-panel)

1.3.title: Implement Arabic RTL Theming
1.3.description: Setup Filament themes with Arabic and RTL support
1.3.details: Configure TailwindCSS with RTL, setup Arabic fonts, and customize Filament panels for Arabic

21.title: Advanced Registration System Implementation
21.description: Create comprehensive registration system with role-specific forms, teacher approval workflow, and automatic parent account creation

21.1.title: Database Schema for Registration System
21.1.description: Create grade_levels, subjects, teacher approval, and WhatsApp notification tables
21.1.details: Implement grade_levels (academy-specific), subjects (academy-specific), teacher_subjects, teacher_grade_levels, teacher_approvals, whatsapp_notifications, and student_grade_levels tables with proper relationships and indexes

21.2.title: Registration Form Routes and Controllers
21.2.description: Create academy-specific registration routes for different user types
21.2.details: Implement /register (type selection), /register/teacher (Quran vs Academic choice), /register/teacher/quran, /register/teacher/academic, /register/student routes with proper tenant-aware controllers and validation

21.3.title: Teacher Registration Forms
21.3.description: Create separate forms for Quran and Academic teacher registration
21.3.details: Quran teacher form: name, phone, email, password, bio, ijazah (yes/no), experience years, grade levels. Academic teacher form: includes qualification degree, university, subjects selection, detailed qualification text

21.4.title: Student Registration with Auto Parent Creation
21.4.description: Student registration form that automatically creates parent accounts
21.4.details: Student form with parent phone field, automatic parent account creation with generated credentials, WhatsApp notification service for sending login details to parents

21.5.title: Teacher Approval Workflow
21.5.description: Admin interface for reviewing and approving teacher registrations
21.5.details: Pending teachers queue in academy admin panel, teacher profile review interface, pricing setup (student price vs teacher price), approval/rejection workflow with notifications

21.6.title: Grade Levels and Subjects Management
21.6.description: Admin panels for managing grade levels and academic subjects
21.6.details: Academy admin CRUD interfaces for grade levels (seeded with primary, preparatory, secondary, university), subjects management (academic only), proper academy scoping and validation

21.7.title: WhatsApp Integration for Parent Notifications
21.7.description: WhatsApp service for sending parent account credentials
21.7.details: WhatsApp API integration (free solution), notification queue system, message templates for parent account creation, delivery status tracking, fallback mechanisms

21.8.title: Supervisor Account Management
21.8.description: Admin interface for creating supervisor accounts with temporary passwords
21.8.details: Academy admin interface for supervisor creation, email/temp password generation, first-login password change flow, proper role assignment and permissions

21.details: Comprehensive registration system supporting different user types with academy-specific data, teacher approval workflows, automatic parent account creation with WhatsApp notifications, and proper admin management interfaces.
21.testStrategy: Test all registration flows, verify teacher approval process, test automatic parent account creation and WhatsApp delivery, verify academy-specific data isolation, test supervisor account creation and first-login experience
